title: Clash [SMS Issue]
body: SMS verification code is not being received by my cellphone

replies.body: You may have to remove the 0 yourself since it automatically adds the +61 (/whatever country code applies). Dunno if that's your problem but it's worth a shot.
Did that still doesn't want to work {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support in that case. Seems like you're not the only one having this issue so hopefully they're aware and it'll be a quick fix.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
